items.details: Upcoming Tests Social Studies - Chapter 3 December 10th (pages 84-136) Winter Festival Countdown! Get Ready to Shine at the Winter Festival Winter Festival Practice Reminder Just over 1 week to go‚ÄîLet‚Äôs Get Festival Ready! Time to Practice for the Winter Festival! The video is below! Reading Complete the definition paper. Please find the words in the story. The story this week is Welcome Back Wolves. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h5ZXpqMFQy0 The spelling test is on Friday! Please look over them every day! habitat solitary multiplied plentiful government threatened livestock decades biodiversity ecosystem negatives myth tourism outweighs risks Extra reading TO IMPROVE READING AND EMBED LEARNING, YOU SHOULD BE LOGGING INTO READWORKS Please go to ReadWorks and complete some of the stories assigned. They will assist you with your schoolwork and also enhance your overall reading skills. Go to www.readworks.org/student Enter our class code YU6GQ2 Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it. Math Complete Additional Practice 7-3 (Student book and homework book) I have added New Khan Academy lessons related to data. Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills. Hi Data Detectives! üïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è For tonight: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Think of a question you‚Äôre interested in. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Write 5 answer options classmates can pick from. Example: Question: ‚ÄúWhat is your favorite fruit?‚Äù Options: Apple, Banana, Grape, Orange, Watermelon Be ready to collect data tomorrow using your frequency table. Science (FRIDAY) Read and complete pages 132 to 137 in the science textbook. Complete the lesson quiz. Social Studies (tomorrow) Read and complete pages 124-131 in the textbook (DUE MONDAY) Please prepare for the test by either playing the blooket - https://play.blooket.com/play?hwId=692fc31a0092a8bf0f16391f and/or reading pages 84-136 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0JYvYiulaXw https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vd0fMpAIs1s https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jsTB7gSfDPI Language Arts Grammar Workshop - 90-91 (Tomorrow) Spanish Write the Spanish words of the song Golden (tomorrow) Chinese Memorize the worksheet given in class by Next Tuesday.
